meanings.definition: The state or quality of being intense to an extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: The superintensity of the storm frightened the children.
meanings.sent2: The superintensity of the sun's rays made everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent3: The superintensity of the puppy's excitement led to a chaotic mess in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The superintensity of her emotions was like a raging wildfire within her.
meanings.sent5: The superintensity of the fireworks display left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: A high level of intensity or strength.
meanings.sent1: The superintensity of the workout left her exhausted but satisfied.
meanings.sent2: The superintensity of the competition brought out the best in the athletes.
meanings.sent3: The superintensity of the toddler's tantrum surprised the parents.
meanings.sent4: The superintensity of the music resonated deep within his soul.
meanings.sent5: The superintensity of the colors in the painting captivated all who saw it.
